$description:
| What does this do? | Ensure Safe Attachments for SharePoint, OneDrive, and Microsoft Teams is Enabled |
| Why should you use this? | Protects users from malware in files shared via SharePoint Online, OneDrive for Business or Teams by detonating the file in a sandbox environment before allowing access. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Minimal impact, some user education is advised. |
| Learn more | [Safe attachments policies](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/office-365-security/safe-attachments-policies-configure?view=o365-worldwide) |
